q1.question: Which industries does MeetCIP work best for?
q1.answer: MeetCIP is pre-configured for 11 industries: Water/Fire Restoration, Foundation Repair, HVAC, Plumbing, Electricians, Garage Door Repair, Roofing, Concrete Leveling, Fencing, Landscaping, and Real Estate. Each industry package includes specialized knowledge and workflows.

q2.question: How does MeetCIP handle emergency calls?
q2.answer: MeetCIP automatically detects urgency keywords and can immediately escalate to your on-call team via SMS or phone. You control the routing rules and can set different escalation paths for different types of emergencies.

q3.question: Can MeetCIP qualify leads for high-ticket services?
q3.answer: Yes! For industries like Foundation Repair and Roofing, MeetCIP asks intelligent qualifying questions to assess project scope, budget, and timeline. High-value leads are flagged for immediate follow-up.

q4.question: What makes MeetCIP different from other AI answering services?
q4.answer: MeetCIP is purpose-built for service businesses with industry-specific templates, bilingual support, and advanced lead qualification. We focus on conversion, not just answering calls.

q5.question: How long does it take to set up?
q5.answer: Most businesses are live in under 30 minutes. Choose your industry template, upload your FAQs and pricing, and forward your calls. Our Smart Customize feature auto-generates prompts based on your business info.

q6.question: Can I try it before committing?
q6.answer: Yes! Request a demo call to hear MeetCIP in action, or sign up for the Starter plan with no contract. Cancel anytime if it's not the right fit.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: MeetCIP was founded on a simple observation: small businesses lose thousands of dollars every year from missed calls. Whether it's after hours, during busy periods, or when staff is unavailable, every missed call is a lost opportunity.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.text: Enterprise technology shouldn't require enterprise budgets. We believe every business deserves professional call handling.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.text: Your customers expect you to be available. We ensure you never miss an opportunity, 24/7/365.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: We leverage cutting-edge AI to deliver conversations that sound natural and build trust with your callers.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.text: No hidden fees, no long-term contracts. Simple pricing that scales with your business.

customerFirst.title: Customer-First
customerFirst.text: Your success is our success. We're here to help you grow your business, not just answer phones.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.text: Your calls and data are encrypted and secure. We never share or sell your information.
